title: Prefigurative Community Building (Part 21): Starting a Non-Monetary Exchange Hub - A Power With Approach to Degrowth
summary: Create non-monetary exchange hubs as degrowth-oriented infrastructure for mutual aid and resource sharing. Build coordination systems based on trust, abundance, and shared access rather than scarcity and ownership.

Community.summary: Create spaces for sharing resources that build connection and challenge transactional thinking.

level0: Gather core circle of 3-5 people who share vision of collective resource-sharing
Choose format - swap market, free market, or hybrid approach
level1: Secure public, accessible space like park or community center
Spread word through story-telling rather than sales pitch
level2: Set culture of Power With - consent, non-hierarchy, mutual respect
Co-create logistics like tables, signage, and flow together
level3: Include more than stuff - food, skills, repair services
Reflect and evolve based on community feedback

Knowledge.summary: Learn and share skills around resource sharing, repair, and gift economy principles.

level0: Practice non-hierarchical organizing and shared decision-making
level1: Learn skills in facilitation, conflict resolution, and space-holding
Develop knowledge about repair, mending, and resource care
level2: Teach others about gift economy and non-monetary exchange
Share skills in sustainable living and degrowth practices
level3: Become resource for community exchange organizing
Create educational materials about alternatives to consumer culture

Narrative.summary: Challenge consumer culture and demonstrate abundance through shared resources.

level0: Practice seeing abundance in what already exists rather than needing more
level1: Share stories about successful resource sharing and gift economy
Challenge narratives about individual ownership and accumulation
level2: Help others understand alternatives to consumer capitalism
Model degrowth principles through community practice
level3: Transform community culture from consumption to care and sharing
Build widespread understanding of abundance through cooperation
